Articles.Content: Ever have a day where something you know won't fly does?

At least it blew up at the end

Very cool video and errr... craft.

Jatwaa:

I'm not entirely sure why you're posting videos here.

Some of your videos are really quite nice, but they're not really supposed to go in the Fan Works section.

There are several places where videos are supposed to go. The "Live From Mission Control!" subforum is used almost exclusively for posting videos. If you want to showcase your craft (this often includes sharing craft files), the Spacecraft Exchange may be a better place to go. The "Fan Works" section is generally used for artwork, writing, music, and heavily edited or not-in-game videos, as well as other, more "creative," things done by forum members. There are two other subforums where your work would be more appropriate. Either of them would be more suited to your videos.

I say this because your posts are responsible for about half of the content marked as "Special" in this subforum. The "Special" designation is given to things that don't fit into the other designations given for prefixes. Sometimes "Special" tags are needed (there's no tag for "Music," for example) but much of the time, things marked "Special" would go better in a different subforum. This is a shame, because some of the things marked "Special" are really special, but others are just mismatched.

So, what would I do if I was in your shoes?

I would move my future activity into the "Live from Mission Control!" subforum, or maybe the Spacecraft Exchange. If you are posting regular content, I would also consolidate your videos into a single thread; after all, there's really no reason to make over a dozen completely separate threads with very similar content, and putting all videos in a single thread helps you grow your subscriber base and viewership without cluttering the forum.

I really like your videos, but I don't like that you're posting them in this subforum, and that you're making a completely separate thread for each one. I would really appreciate it if you could take this into consideration. I'm sorry for any inconvenience, and I don't mean to offend.
